articles.author: Podishetti Akash
articles.title: Reliance Q4 results: Net profit rises 22% to ₹16,203 cr, misses estimates
articles.description: The oil-to-telecom conglomerate's revenue from operations rose 37% to  ₹2.11 lakh crore.
articles.content: Reliance Industries Ltd. posted 22% growth in consolidated net profit at 16,203 crore for the three months ended 31 March. It was 13,227 crore in the corresponding period of last year.
